name: Runway ML
about: An AI-powered video editing tool that lets you generate and edit videos with simple prompts.
summary: Create or edit videos with AI in minutes, not hours.
details: Runway ML combines AI and creativity to transform how videos are produced. You can remove backgrounds, generate scenes, and edit videos instantly with text commands.
howTo: Upload or generate your video in Runway.
Use tools like 'Remove Background' or 'Text to Video'.
Fine-tune lighting, color, and motion automatically.
Export and share your polished video content.
